messages.speech:
You can repeat a course to improve a grade.  Only the latest grade on file is calculated into your cumulative GPA; however, all grades will appear on your transcript.  You may petition to repeat using a substitute course if the original course is not available. You must fill out a "Repeat of Course" form and turn it into the Records Office.
https://www.century.edu/sites/default/files/records-repeatofcourse.pdf

Note:  If you plan on transferring to another institution, you will want to see how your repeated grade will be considered.  It may be possible that both grades will be calculated.
